development of cassava. The model was developed by Ezui et al.

new.name: qcoder

new.name: centr
new.title: Weighted and Unweighted Spatial Centers
new.description:
Generate mean and median weighted or unweighted spatial
centers. Functions are analogous to their identically named
counterparts within 'ArcGIS Pro'.
